sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthprogrmchangedtls ( PROGRM_FILE_NM /* */ , REQUST_NO /* */ , RQESTER_ID /* */ , CHANGE_REQUST_CN /* */ , REQUST_PROCESS_CN /* */ , OPETR_ID /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_DE /* */ , RQESTDE /* */ , REQUST_SJ /* */ ) VALUES ( #progrmFileNm# /* */ , #requstNo# /* */ , #rqesterId# /* */ , #changeRequstCn# /* */ , #requstProcessCn# /* */ , #opetrId# /* */ , #processSttusCode# /* */ , #processDe# /* */ , #rqestde# /* */ , #requstSj# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthprogrmchangedtls SET PROGRM_FILE_NM=#progrmFileNm# /* */ , REQUST_NO=#requstNo# /* */ , RQESTER_ID=#rqesterId# /* */ , CHANGE_REQUST_CN=#changeRequstCn# /* */ , REQUST_PROCESS_CN=#requstProcessCn# /* */ , OPETR_ID=#opetrId# /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE=#processSttusCode# /* */ , PROCESS_DE=#processDe# /* */ , RQESTDE=#rqestde# /* */ , REQUST_SJ=#requstSj# /* */ WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#progrmFileNm# /* */ AND REQUST_NO=#requstNo# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthprogrmchangedtls WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#progrmFileNm# /* */ AND REQUST_NO=#requstNo# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM /* */ , REQUST_NO /* */ , RQESTER_ID /* */ , CHANGE_REQUST_CN /* */ , REQUST_PROCESS_CN /* */ , OPETR_ID /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_DE /* */ , RQESTDE /* */ , REQUST_SJ /* */ FROM comthprogrmchangedtls WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#progrmFileNm# /* */ AND REQUST_NO=#requstNo# /* */

SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM /* */ , REQUST_NO /* */ , RQESTER_ID /* */ , CHANGE_REQUST_CN /* */ , REQUST_PROCESS_CN /* */ , OPETR_ID /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE /* */ , PROCESS_DE /* */ , RQESTDE /* */ , REQUST_SJ /* */ FROM comthprogrmchangedtls WHERE 1=1
PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword# /* */
REQUST_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY PROGRM_FILE_NM DESC /* */ , REQUST_NO DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

PROGRM_FILE_NM = #searchKeyword# /* */
